body.raw:
SELECT 'Hello Workers Analytics Engine' AS message
FORMAT TabSeparated

SELECT
    timestamp,
    index1 as handler,
    blob1 AS cf_ray,
    blob2 AS url,
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    blob6 AS city,
    blob7 AS region,
    blob8 AS country,
    blob9 AS colo,
    double1 AS attempt,
    double2 AS duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
FORMAT JSONEachRow

item.name: Select Records by Interval and URL

body.raw:
SELECT
    timestamp,
    index1 as handler,
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob1 AS cf_ray,
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    blob9 AS colo,
    double1 AS attempt,
    double2 AS duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' HOUR AND
    position('SCH6FAC06002NOW001' IN blob2) > 0
ORDER BY timestamp ASC, cf_ray ASC, handler ASC
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 60) * 300 AS t, 
    index1 as handler,    
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' HOUR AND handler = 'L3'
GROUP BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
ORDER BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 300) * 300 AS t, 
    index1 as handler,    
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
GROUP BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
ORDER BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT    
    index1 as handler,    
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration,
    COUNT() AS count_ray
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
GROUP BY handler, cf_cache_status, cf_cache_source
ORDER BY handler, cf_cache_status, cf_cache_source
FORMAT JSONEachRow
